properties.title: Pumptrack Langwies
properties.abstract: The asphalt pump track is located adjacent to the school of Langwies. No matter whether you have a mountain bike, a BMX or a skateboard, this is where you can demonstrate your skills and technique. Jumping elements and different combinations of loops offer lots of fun for everyone.
properties.highlights:
Length: 170 m
Surface area: 660 m2
Wave and curve height: 30 - 130 cm
Surface: asphalt
properties.name: Gemeinde Zurzach
